mapper.delete: DELETE from t_order WHERE orderId in (${idStr})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_order SET customId = #{customId}, time = #{time}, address = #{address}, content = #{content}, comment = #{comment} WHERE orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from t_order where customId in ( select customId from custom where custom.customName like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{vo.customName}),'%') )
AND time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %T')) AND time <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %T'))
